p1: I'm a full-stack developer and aspiring software architect located in St. Paul, MN.  My career began in 2012 and includes a range of large corporate clients to small businesses.  I leverage battle-tested design patterns as well as current industry trends to deliver high-quality solutions.  I'm currently interested in PWAs, the JAMstack, and GraphQL.
p2: Check out my Github projects for code samples or download my resume for a full client list.
